alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 23 at 5:40PM CDT until August 27 at 8:01PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Mississippi including the following counties, Claiborne, Hinds, Issaquena, Madison, Rankin, Yazoo, and Warren. * WHEN...Until 1130 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Low-water crossings may be inundated with water and may not be passable. Expect areas of slow moving or standing water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 535 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated areas of heavy rain moving across the warned area. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen with additional heavy rain expected. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Jackson, Clinton, Pearl, Madison, Ridgeland, Vicksburg, Brandon, Canton, Byram, Flowood, Richland, Star, Redwood, Florence, Raymond, Flora, Pelahatchie, Terry, Edwards and Utica. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
